languages.text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: This plasma gun overheats for 1 turn instead of 2 after the use of the Plasma Overcharge ability.

The wielder gains +1 stack of marquessa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

The wielder gains +1 stack of marquessa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

The wielder gains +1 stack of Marchesa's thirst when {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hits{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

languages.text: 当装备者使用这把武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，获得1层公爵饥渴效果，击杀目标时获得3层此效果。当此效果叠加至5层时，装备者立刻获得一次额外攻击，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果触发后，移除所有层数。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用这把武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}时，获得1层公爵饥渴效果，击杀目标时获得3层此效果。当此效果叠加至5层时，装备者立刻获得一次额外攻击，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果触发后，移除所有层数。

languages.text: El portador obtiene +1 acumulación de Sed de la marquesa al asestar un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} con esta arma y +3 acumulaciones al matar a un enemigo con ella. Al alcanzar 5 acumulaciones, el portador gana un ataque adicional hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al activarse el efecto, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene +1 acumulación de Sed de la marquesa al asestar un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} con esta arma y +3 acumulaciones al matar a un enemigo con ella. Al alcanzar 5 acumulaciones, el portador gana un ataque adicional hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Al activarse el efecto, se eliminan todas las acumulaciones.
Este rifle de plasma nunca se recalienta.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffers{/g} mit dieser Waffe +1 Stapel Marchesas Durst bzw. +3 Stapel, wenn er ein Ziel mit dieser Waffe tötet. Hat der Träger 5 Stapel, erhält er bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} einen zusätzlichen Angriff. Wird dieser Effekt ausgelöst, werden alle Stapel entfernt.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält im Falle eines {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffers{/g} mit dieser Waffe +1 Stapel Marchesas Durst bzw. +3 Stapel, wenn er ein Ziel mit dieser Waffe tötet. Hat der Träger 5 Stapel, erhält er bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} einen zusätzlichen Angriff. Wird dieser Effekt ausgelöst, werden alle Stapel entfernt.

languages.text: L'utilisateur gagne +1 cumul de Soif de Marchesa lorsqu'il inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} avec cette arme et +3 cumuls s'il tue sa cible. Au bout de 5 cumuls, il bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Une fois l'effet déclenché, tous les cumuls sont supprimés.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur gagne +1 cumul de Soif de Marchesa lorsqu'il inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} avec cette arme et +3 cumuls s'il tue sa cible. Au bout de 5 cumuls, il bénéficie d'une attaque supplémentaire jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Une fois l'effet déclenché, tous les cumuls sont supprimés.

languages.text: Персонаж получает 1 уровень эффекта жажды маркизы, когда совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} этим оружием, и 3 уровня — когда убивает с его помощью. Накопив 5 уровней, персонаж получает дополнительную атаку до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. При активации эффекта все уровни снимаются.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of Marchesa's thirst when {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hits{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает 1 уровень эффекта жажды маркизы, когда совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} этим оружием, и 3 уровня — когда убивает с его помощью. Накопив 5 уровней, персонаж получает дополнительную атаку до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. При активации эффекта все уровни снимаются.

Персонаж получает 1 уровень эффекта жажды маркизы, когда совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} этим оружием, и 3 уровня — когда убивает с его помощью. Накопив 5 уровней, персонаж получает дополнительную атаку до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. При активации эффекта все уровни снимаются.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリチカルヒット{/g}すると、保有者がマルケーザの渇きのスタックを受ける。ターゲットを殺すと、保有者が３スタックを受ける。５スタックがある場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の追加攻撃を得る。あとには全部スタックが解除される。
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of Marchesa's thirst when {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hits{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリチカルヒット{/g}すると、保有者がマルケーザの渇きのスタックを受ける。ターゲットを殺すと、保有者が３スタックを受ける。５スタックがある場合、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の追加攻撃を得る。あとには全部スタックが解除される。

languages.text: Kullanan kişi; bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde +1, bir hedefi öldürdüğünde ise +3 markizin susuzluğu birikimi kazanır. Kullanan kişi, 5 birikime ulaştığında {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} sonuna dek kullanabileceği ilave bir saldırı kazanır. Bu etki tetiklendiğinde tüm birikimler de ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: The wielder gains +1 stack of marchesa's thirst when scoring a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} with this weapon and +3 stacks when killing a target with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks, the wielder gains an additional attack until the end of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Once this effect is triggered, all stacks are removed.

traits.locale_text: Bu plazma tüfeği asla aşırı ısınmaz.

Kullanan kişi; bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde +1, bir hedefi öldürdüğünde ise +3 markizin susuzluğu birikimi kazanır. Kullanan kişi, 5 birikime ulaştığında {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} sonuna dek kullanabileceği ilave bir saldırı kazanır. Bu etki tetiklendiğinde tüm birikimler de ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Gain 1 Stack of {g|f:3088353ac6184d729d074dcbc5ad9824}Marchesa’s Thirst{/g} on crit and 3 stacks on kill with this weapon. Upon reaching 5 stacks gain an additional attack and remove all stacks.
